text: Hey Ex-Roomie... 1st year me yoga, Eng class me hum mile the...wahan se roomie k ending tak ka safar tak mere liye toh bahot amazing safar tere sath rha h.  Thanks mere roomie ban ne k liye and Sorry becz of my mom's call. I know mere mummy kv kv bahot rat ko nhi toh subhah 6bje aise time pe call kr k bahot disturb kiye hai. Acha lga tere jaise cool, calm, sweet friend se mil k...
author: Lopamudra  Singh

text:
Hy neighbor....Firstly I want to say sorry for misunderstood you....bahot time se ye bolna chahti thi...it's true that hmra 1st meeting as a roomie itna acha nhi rha mere liye since us time pe closed friend k alwa mujhe bakiyon se bat krne me v bahot uncomfortable lg jati thi. But after room change I tried to talked to you...Luckily us k bad wle year me v hm neighbors rahe toh kuch v room ka prblm ho ya course ka prblm me hmesha tere pas jati thi..
Wese toh hmesha tu cheerful and happy rhti h isliye mil k acha lga...Take care
author: Lopamudra  Singh
